item.title: Personality Box – You had me at upload
item.description:
As announced yesterday, IBM has formed a partnership with Box.com, a partnership that includes the integration of Box into the Bluemix catalog. With its REST-based Content and View APIs, embedding enterprise-grade file storage into your app and enabling file sharing among your users has never been simpler.

To help you on your way to becoming a file-sharing guru, Bluemix developer advocate Jake Peyser and I have built a sample app that you can leverage as you begin to explore the possibilities of the Box.com APIs. The video below shows the application and outlines the steps to create it:

If you want to follow written step-by-step instructions on how we leveraged the Box.com and Watson Personality Insights services to create our app, see Integrate Cloud File Storage and Sharing into your Bluemix App with Box. We encourage you to pick up where we left off and build on this sample!
